text: The 1940 season was the Hawthorn Football Club's 16th season in the Victorian Football League and 39th overall. ==Fixture== ===Patriotic Premiership=== The VFL between Rounds 14 and 15 played a one-day lightning carnival, Known as the Patriotic Premiership, at the Melbourne Cricket Ground to raise money for the Patriotic Fund.
